MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G71 and G72 postcode areas of Blantyre. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.17pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working repair a grounded overhead power line, affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.25pm on Friday 23rd October 2020.
